attributes.action: bring Cannon & Ball to Bradford for panto
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As much as we love Billy Pearce, you can only stand so many years in a row. Bradford needs Cannon & Ball in panto 2009.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
